## Code Example

Here's a simple code example:

```python
# Example code - set eval to true to run
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Create sample data
data = pd.DataFrame({
    'x': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
    'y': [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]
})

plt.plot(data['x'], data['y'])
plt.title('My First Plot')
plt.xlabel('X values')
plt.ylabel('Y values')
plt.show()
```
